summary: The diff implements all major frontend requirements (REQ-9 through REQ-13) including side-by-side comparison, premium/maturity calculators, ROI analysis, and search/filter functionality with trilingual support. Backend data extraction (REQ-14) is partially implemented with structured types and sample data for 2 plans, but lacks complete extraction from all 6 plan images.

missing_requirements.requirement: Extract and structure detailed data from all 6 uploaded LIC plan images including premium tables with age-based rates, maturity benefit formulas, policy terms, guaranteed additions/bonuses, risk coverage details, and special features
missing_requirements.reason: Backend only shows sample premium rates for 2 plans (Jivan Labh and Jivan Umang at ages 30 and 40). The remaining 4 plans (Bima Laxmi, Jivan Lakshya, Jivan Utsav, Jivan Shanti) lack complete premium rate tables extracted from images. Sample data is insufficient compared to 'detailed data from images' requirement.
